title: Venezuelan security forces detain journalists from foreign news organisations

title: Russia sends navy ships to guard oil tanker being pursued by US forces

title: Six dead and hundreds of flights cancelled as snow causes chaos across Europe

title: Iran anti-government protests spread to majority of provinces, videos show
generated_title: The wave of protests has spread rapidly across Iran since 28 December. Anger initially broke out in the capital Tehran following a sharp devaluation of the country's currency. Protests have also been reported in Qom in central Iran and Mashhad
